posts.title: Lisa Guy: Rage Bait or Real Scandal?
posts.excerpt: Crux framed councillor Lisa Guy at the centre of a ‘conflict of interest’ storm over QLDC’s water CCO. The record suggests a modest, lawful $8k advisory contract — not the $1B scandal the headlines imply.

posts.title: Queenstown's Water Vote: What the Headlines Missed
posts.excerpt: Crux framed the council’s water decision as scandal. Here’s a calmer read: statutory obligations, infrastructure realities, and trade-offs that rarely survive a rage-bait headline.

posts.title: Peter Newport: Journalism or Opinion?
posts.excerpt: When Peter Newport launched Crux in 2018, he promised fearless investigative journalism. Six years on, his track record tells another story — one of sensational headlines, blurred boundaries between fact and opinion, and repeated brushes with the New Zealand Media Council.
